name: Multiplayer Mini Golf
description:
Multiplayer Mini Golf is an exciting golf simulator that allows you to hone your putting skills then take on the world to become online golf champion. Go head-to-head with other golfing players from around the world and earn coins and achievements

Features:

• Precision controls allow you to adjust your aim and set your perfect swing strength.
• Vibrant colorful graphics and beautiful courses.
• Challenging golf holes for hours of entertainment.
• Best of 3 head-to-head multiplayer matchups.
• Earn Achievements - collect them all, become a golfing master!


Coming soon:

• Fully stocked pro shop - spend your hard earned coins on customizing your gear and buying exciting new kit, show the world you’re a real pro!
